article.name: What is the time interval between alert checks?
article.title: What is the time interval between alert checks?
article.body:
• When the Mackerel is not receiving transmissions from the agent for a 10 minute period of time, it will be judged as NG.
  • Host metric monitors, and check monitors will be judged as OK/NG when data is sent to the Mackerel.
  • Service metric monitors will be judged as OK/NG when metrics are sent to the Mackere.
  • External monitors will be checked and judged as OK/NG every minute.
  • There is a possibility that in the future the aforementioned check intervals will be revised.
